segments.text: This kitchen drawing captures a moment of everyday life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman dries dishes with quiet concentration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Alarmingly, water pours from the sink uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflow soaks the floor and cabinets thoroughly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's ankle-deep in it, yet smiles faintly at her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids raid the cookie jar in secret.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy perches unstably, plate in one hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Any second, he might tumble into the wet mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister reaches up, full of hopeful anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside garden looks idyllic and undisturbed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel angry at the overlooked risks here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears for everyone.
segments.speaker: PAR
